description:
CAVE is an open-source managed service for monitoring infrastructure, platform, and application metrics. Written in Scala with Akka and Play, CAVE uses InfluxDB, and Amazon Web Services to provide visibility into your system’s performance and operational levels.

About the Speaker:
When he is not busy playing computer games or watching football (Go Broncos!), Val enjoys designing, developing, testing, deploying and operating large scale distributed systems. He is a Senior Software Development Engineer at Gilt for the past two years.
